author: https://www.abc.net.au/news/jacob-kagi/4421098
title: Man dies from coronavirus at Royal Perth Hospital as WA toll rises to four
description: Western Australia records its fourth coronavirus death, with a man in his 80s becoming the latest victim of the virus.
content:
Updated 
April 06, 2020 15:19:06
Western Australia has recorded its fourth coronavirus death, with a man in his 80s becoming the latest victim of COVID-19.
Health Minister Roger Cook confirmed the man was 84 years old and he died at Royal Perth Hospital, w… [+1763 chars]
